original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1076)@</color>召喚 <color=#ccffcc>12</color> 隻如同狂風一般的<color=#4cc769>蛟鱷軍</color>加入我方。<color=#4cc769>蛟鱷軍</color>屬性<color=#FFE787>體力值：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_HP(1251)@</color>   <color=#FFE787>武力值：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_Str(1251)@</color>機率性發動特殊攻擊以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(566)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>將範圍內敵方捲起來造成物理傷害
